channel.title: Rune-Evo 4
channel.description:
[font=verdana][size=7]Rune Evo 4[/size][/font] by King Fox (Fox2007)
Been a long while since i had a release, so i took my current source (Foxtrot) and stripped out all the hard stuff i had been working on for a long time to bring this back down to a decent level. This does indeed contain some of the crap RE3 had. I am still in the progress of rewriting how alot of stuff is handled as I begin to learn new stuff.
If you're looking for a decent server with room to add your own content, then this would be a good choice as a lot of critical bugs have been patched that most servers dont even realize exist. There's more fixed than what's listed below, but thats all i could think of at this time.
If you need help with any part of this, please do not blow me up on skype on in pm's. Make use of the help section because that's what it's there for. People usually reply quickly to requests so make use of it please c: Also, To make yourself owner before that gets spammed please read below:
[ul][li]Go into Settings.java location in package com.foxtrot[/li] [li]There will be an array at the top with my name in it, just edit the name there[/li] [li]Save Settings.java, reload server and login and your rights (should) be set to where it needs to be[/li][/ul]
On a side note, I've removed the cache and bin folder so you'll need to find a 718/742 cache for this and basically any matrix client, and also need to recompile the source (an ide is highly recommended, might as well get to know it if you're gonna be programming at all)
What i removed (completely):
[ul][li]Gravestones[/li] [li]60 floor Dungeoneering[/li] [li]Ring of Kinship[/li] [li]Castle Wars[/li] [li]MySQL system (was an "ok" system)[/li] [li]Player Owned Shops[/li] [li]Grand Exchange[/li] [li]Troll Invasion[/li] [li]Party Room[/li] [li]Bat files for Editors (use an ide)[/li] [li]Cache and bin folders[/li] [li]Duel Arena (which it never had in the first place, meh)[/li] [li]+ More, cant remember.[/li][/ul]
What it still has/What's New:
[ul][li]All matrix features (i think)[/li] [li]Clan Chat[/li] [li]Construction[/li] [li]Farming[/li] [li]All other skills (minus Dungeoneering)[/li] [li]A start to multi-world support[/li] [li]WAY better organization[/li] [li]WAY Better stability[/li] [li]Fixed trading self dupe[/li] [li]Fixed money pouch to bank dupe[/li] [li]Fixed price checker dupe[/li] [li]Fixed Jad Wave-Skipping by using Nomad to null PA's[/li] [li]Fixed bug that allowed players to attack players across the wildy ditch[/li] [li]Fixed memory leak in construction[/li] [li]Fixed bug in construction that would cause server to crash by spamming join[/li] [li]Fixed PAFT(sp?) in construction[/li] [li]Fixed JS5 exploit[/li] [li]Removed alot of unused or empty class files (was quite a bit, its like that in original matrix)[/li] [li]Improved Shops (with item stats)[/li] [li]Full Squeal of Fortune[/li] [li]Working Notes with all options (add, edit, delete, change color, etc.)[/li] [li]Custom packet to send a tray notification to client (must have client with it!)[/li] [li]Toolbelt with alot of the skills making use of it[/li] [li]IP Based loyalty point system (shop prices need edited, token prices also)[/li][/ul]
Download (Source Only): [url=http://uppit.com/kml5rficc1am/Foxtrot_Release.zip]Download Foxtrot.Release.zip @ UppIT[/url] Find your own cache/client, runeevo3 cache and client should work okiedokie
[spoiler] [img]http://i.imgur.com/erA2dvc.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/hliSzR4.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/fdWR8Vg.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/UHlcfua.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/NAOOwVC.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/QnD42tW.png[/img] [/spoiler]
Credits Myself? Matrix? meh

item.title: Rune-Evo 4
item.dc:creator: @ownerstewie ownerstewie
item.description:
@ownerstewie wrote:

how i need to change this ???

@title Rune-Evo Server
@echo off
server -XX:-OmitStackTraceInFastThrow -Xms512m -Xmx1024m -cp bin;lib/*; com.foxtrot.Server
pause

Read full topic

item.title: Rune-Evo 4
item.dc:creator: @Fox2007 Fox2007
item.description:
@Fox2007 wrote:

[font=verdana][size=7]Rune Evo 4[/size][/font]
by King Fox (Fox2007)

Been a long while since i had a release, so i took my current source (Foxtrot) and stripped out all the hard stuff i had been working on for a long time to bring this back down to a decent level. This does indeed contain some of the crap RE3 had. I am still in the progress of rewriting how alot of stuff is handled as I begin to learn new stuff.

If you’re looking for a decent server with room to add your own content, then this would be a good choice as a lot of critical bugs have been patched that most servers dont even realize exist. There’s more fixed than what’s listed below, but thats all i could think of at this time.

If you need help with any part of this, please do not blow me up on skype on in pm’s. Make use of the help section because that’s what it’s there for. People usually reply quickly to requests so make use of it please c: Also, To make yourself owner before that gets spammed please read below:

[ul][li]Go into Settings.java location in package com.foxtrot[/li]
[li]There will be an array at the top with my name in it, just edit the name there[/li]
[li]Save Settings.java, reload server and login and your rights (should) be set to where it needs to be[/li][/ul]

On a side note, I’ve removed the cache and bin folder so you’ll need to find a 718/742 cache for this and basically any matrix client, and also need to recompile the source (an ide is highly recommended, might as well get to know it if you’re gonna be programming at all)

What i removed (completely):

[ul][li]Gravestones[/li]
[li]60 floor Dungeoneering[/li]
[li]Ring of Kinship[/li]
[li]Castle Wars[/li]
[li]MySQL system (was an “ok” system)[/li]
[li]Player Owned Shops[/li]
[li]Grand Exchange[/li]
[li]Troll Invasion[/li]
[li]Party Room[/li]
[li]Bat files for Editors (use an ide)[/li]
[li]Cache and bin folders[/li]
[li]Duel Arena (which it never had in the first place, meh)[/li]
[li]+ More, cant remember.[/li][/ul]

What it still has/What’s New:

[ul][li]All matrix features (i think)[/li]
[li]Clan Chat[/li]
[li]Construction[/li]
[li]Farming[/li]
[li]All other skills (minus Dungeoneering)[/li]
[li]A start to multi-world support[/li]
[li]WAY better organization[/li]
[li]WAY Better stability[/li]
[li]Fixed trading self dupe[/li]
[li]Fixed money pouch to bank dupe[/li]
[li]Fixed price checker dupe[/li]
[li]Fixed Jad Wave-Skipping by using Nomad to null PA’s[/li]
[li]Fixed bug that allowed players to attack players across the wildy ditch[/li]
[li]Fixed memory leak in construction[/li]
[li]Fixed bug in construction that would cause server to crash by spamming join[/li]
[li]Fixed PAFT(sp?) in construction[/li]
[li]Fixed JS5 exploit[/li]
[li]Removed alot of unused or empty class files (was quite a bit, its like that in original matrix)[/li]
[li]Improved Shops (with item stats)[/li]
[li]Full Squeal of Fortune[/li]
[li]Working Notes with all options (add, edit, delete, change color, etc.)[/li]
[li]Custom packet to send a tray notification to client (must have client with it!)[/li]
[li]Toolbelt with alot of the skills making use of it[/li]
[li]IP Based loyalty point system (shop prices need edited, token prices also)[/li][/ul]

Download (Source Only): Download Foxtrot.Release.zip @ UppIT
Find your own cache/client, runeevo3 cache and client should work okiedokie

[spoiler]






[/spoiler]
